titleStmt.title: The Devil pursued, or, the The Right saddle laid upon the right Mare a satyr upon Madam Celliers standing in the pillory : being convicted for the publishing of a late lying scandalous pamphlet called Malice defeated &c. / by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Person of quality.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased and torn, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
